channel.title: Friend cant connect
channel.description:
i have downloaded a source and a client, i have changed the ip to an no-ip adresse (at the client). i can play on the server, but a friend cant, for him always comes: the server is currently offline, but i startet run.bat (at the source) and it says its online. then i have put the port at utorrent to 43594 but still doesnt work. then i have opened the port 43594 at our fritzbox (i hope ive done it :D ) but still doesnt work
now my questions: -is something wrong? or have i forgotten something? -if i use hamachi (didnt try yet), do my friends have to have hamachi too??
hope you can help =)

item.title: Friend cant connect
item.dc:creator: @winnetou1234 winnetou1234
item.description:
@winnetou1234 wrote:

it says that it isnt open (it isnt list under: common ports)
u know any tips how to open it?

EDIT: now it says its open!!
what to do now?
i have to send my client to my friends, they have to start it and finish?

Read full topic

item.title: Friend cant connect
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

canyouseeme.org check if port 43594 is open on there if its not you portforwarded wrong

Read full topic
